content.question: In lines 3-4, it nigrum campis agmen praedamque per herbas convectant is translated

choices.label: this black line carries the spoils in the fields and through the grass
they carry the black line and the spoils in the fields and through the grass
the line goes in the black fields, and the spoils are carried through the grass
the black line goes in the fields, and they carry their spoils through the grass

content.answer: the black line goes in the fields, and they carry their spoils through the grass

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
